extendedInfo.description: This app is for users who have certain free outgoing calls per month and for users who have first X minutes of outgoing call free.    Yes, Call Saver allows you to monitor your free outgoing calls based on your configured call plan, performs automatic call hangup after X minutes, auto redials after hangup and periodically alerts every minute of a call.The app is fully configurable with a refreshed User Interface.FEATURES:1. OUTGOING CALL MONITORING2. BRIEF CALL DETAILS ON APP'S HOMESCREEN2. CONTACT LEVEL DETAILED CALL INFORMATION3. PERIODIC NOTIFICATIONS ABOUT REMAINING CALLS IN SMART INTERVALS AND CANCELS NOTIFICATIONS AUTOMATICALLY3. AUTO HANGUP CALLS AFTER X MINUTES4. AUTO REDIALS CALLS AFTER HANGUP5. HANGUP TIMER STARTS ONLY AFTER THE CALL IS ANSWERED6. EXTEND THE CALL BY CANCELING AUTO HANGUP FROM NOTIFICATION BAR WHILE ON CALL7. ALERTS BEFORE COMPLETION OF EVERY MINUTE OF AN OUTGOING CALL BY BEEP OR VIBRATE1.CALL PLAN MONITOR:* Lets you configure your free calls, date when your plan resets and can select contacts to whom the call is free.* Counts the outgoing calls made to every phone contact or selected contacts which is user configurable.* Displays the calls remaining and days remaining on app's home screen and notifies you the remaining calls in smart intervals at the time of call.* Gives you a detailed contact level information about your calls.2.AUTO HANGUP CALLS:* This feature is of high importance to users with call plans in which the first 'X' minutes of any call is free.* Auto hang up timer lets you specify the hang up time after which the outgoing call is automatically hung up.This auto hang up feature can be enabled or disabled as per user preferences.* This feature is applicable to all phone contacts or selected set of contacts.* The auto redialer feature that can be enabled or disabled redials to the caller whose call in progress was hung up automatically by the application in 5 secs.* Maintains a perfect timer by starting the timer only after the call is answered.3. ALERTS:*Alert feature alerts user at a user specified second of every minute, while the user is on an outgoing call.The alert type can be customized between a beep, vibrate or both.We constantly listen to you:Use Send Feedback option within the app to send in your feedback and suggestions to serve you better.

reviews.comment: Till it was working wonderful but from this billing cycle I.e. from 11th may 2013 its not working properly. I have done 79 calls & it shows only 7 calls. Pls fix this issue. I want to see in the last month how many mins I have made to compare it woth the bill from the service company.... plus ot would be nice if u add a feature allows me to choose numbera for free calls based on the network type ... I mean 010 means voda and 012 is mobinile
